availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: George S. Myers (Rockcastle County, Kentucky, tailor.)

body.p: Rockcastle County, Kentucky, tailor. Virginia native. Married to Elizabeth Proctor Myers. Father of James Myers, William Myers, Alexander Myers, Mary F. Myers, Eliza A. Myers, Susan Myers, and Andrew Myers. Tailor in Rockcastle County, Kentucky, in 1850. Tailor in Rockcastle County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Rockcastle County, Southern District, pp. 161B-162A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Rockcastle County, pp. 553-4.
Kentucky Death Certificates, 1911-1965, Kentucky Office of Vital Statistics, KDLA, Frankfort, KY, File 7354.
